name: Crystal Capture Cave
description:
This is a game I made for a birthday party. It is a bit light on explanation but starts with a lobby scene where up to 20 (!) players can join with different gamepads and one on the keyboard.

Music and sounds by earwormaud.io

A to join and B to leave (XBox)
X to join and Circle to leave (PS3/PS4)
Space to join and Z to leave (keyboard)

This is a team-based capture the flag game. it hasn't had lots of play-testing, but there is a debug menu where you can tweak some of the variables. Press the ~ key in the lobby to access those.

Players can equip a sword or a lantern when the match starts. the lantern provides shielding to teammates and doubles damage to opponents in the light radius.
